pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena rañño pasenadissa kosalassa uyyāne cittāgāre paṭibhānacittaṃ kataṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:1.6: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo cittāgāraṃ dassanāya gacchissanti, seyyathāpi gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyo”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:1.7: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:1.8: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:1.9: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo cittāgāraṃ dassanāya gacchissantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:1.10: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo cittāgāraṃ dassanāya gacchantī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:1.13: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo cittāgāraṃ dassanāya gacchissanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:1.15: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:1.16: “Yā pana bhikkhunī rājāgāraṃ vā cittāgāraṃ vā ārāmaṃ vā uyyānaṃ vā pokkharaṇiṃ vā dassanāya gaccheyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:2.1.6: yattha katthaci rañño kīḷituṃ ramituṃ kataṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:2.1.8: yattha katthaci manussānaṃ kīḷituṃ ramituṃ kataṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:2.1.10: yattha katthaci manussānaṃ kīḷituṃ ramituṃ kato hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:2.1.12: yattha katthaci manussānaṃ kīḷituṃ ramituṃ kataṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:2.1.14: yattha katthaci manussānaṃ kīḷituṃ ramituṃ katā hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:2.1.17: Dassanūpacāraṃ vijahitvā punappunaṃ passati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:2.1.20: Dassanūpacāraṃ vijahitvā punappunaṃ passati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
